title: Security Analytics Systems
extract: A Definition of Security Analytics. Security analytics is the process of using data collection, aggregation, and analysis tools for security monitoring and threat detection. ... Security analytics data can be collected in several ways, including from: Network traffic. Endpoint and user behavior data.Sep 12, 2018
